mng: to throw, to toss, to fling, to cast, to abandon

exm.mng: lit. to throw a brick to attract jade (idiom); fig. I offer a humble remark, please give us your valued opinion (e.g. commonplace remarks as a foreword to a distinguished speech)
to abandon, to discard, to renounce, to dump (sb)
to dump (selling abroad more cheaply than cost price at home)
to throw out, to get rid of
to throw down, to dump, to abandon, thrown down
to drop anchor, to break down (of a car etc)
